experiences.description: Led testing efforts for high-impact projects, ensuring quality standards and timely delivery. Implemented automated testing strategies and conducted performance testing using JMeter.

Led testing efforts for high-impact projects, ensuring quality standards and timely delivery

Recognized for strong cross-functional collaboration and mentoring capabilities

experiences.description: Spearheaded the development and implementation of comprehensive test plans for major software releases. Executed end-to-end testing for critical modules and played a key role in successful implementations.

Executed end-to-end testing for critical modules
Played a key role in successful implementation of CASMEX and iShield
Conducted thorough regression testing, resulting in a 20% reduction in post-release defects
Demonstrated potential for advancement to team lead position

experiences.description: Oversaw a team of customer support representatives, ensuring timely and effective resolution of customer issues. Implemented new protocols and procedures while collaborating with product development teams.
achievements: Implemented new customer support protocols, resulting in a 25% increase in customer satisfaction
Developed and conducted training sessions for new support team members
Collaborated with product development team to relay customer feedback
Played a pivotal role in successful implementation of CASMEX and iShield systems
Demonstrated strong teamwork skills and leadership potential
